input.name: btnColor
input.label: Button background color (Hex value)
input.help-text: Use a hexadecimal color value for the background of the button (example: "#4286f4"), or a valid color name (example: "red" or "white").

input.name: externalUrl
input.label: Link to: External URL ...
input.help-text: Add an URL, points to external web site. Url should contain "https" or "http". For example https://example.com. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to other page" at time. In case you fill both fields, "External URL" has priority and the button will link to it.

input.name: btnUrl
input.label: ... or: Link to a page
input.help-text: Select a page that you have already made and want the button points to it. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to other page" at time. In case you fill both fields, "External URL" has priority and the button will link to it.
